      Method
      Description
      org.jscience.mathematics.cryptography.HashFunctions.md5(byte[])
      org.jscience.mathematics.vector.backends.ComputeContext.getDenseProvider()
      Use ComputeContext.getLinearAlgebraProvider(org.jscience.mathematics.structures.rings.Field) instead.
      org.jscience.mathematics.vector.backends.ComputeContext.getLinearAlgebraProvider(Field<E>)
      Use ComputeContext.getDenseLinearAlgebraProvider(org.jscience.mathematics.structures.rings.Field) instead.
      org.jscience.mathematics.vector.backends.ComputeContext.getSparseProvider()
      Use ComputeContext.getLinearAlgebraProvider(org.jscience.mathematics.structures.rings.Field) instead.
      org.jscience.mathematics.vector.backends.ComputeContext.global()
      Use ComputeContext.current() instead. Maintained for backward compatibility during refactor.
